name: Another Minimal War
description:
IMPORTANT: Choose Survival at the title screen, cause Campaign is really unfinished!

This is my LudumDare26 entry. Its the very polished post judgement version. Hope you will have fun playing this fast-paced arcade survival shooting game a little bit. It's mostly inspired by the game NuclearThrone by Vlambeer...

Instructions:

You will play the game with WASD and mouse. Use left mouse button to shoot and right mousebutton to use the melee-attack. Goal of the game is to survive the constantly spawning enemies as long as possible to gain a good score. Enemies re dropping money and ammo-packs... use your ammo economical cause there are more enemies as you can find bullets :)

Have fun!

Here is a special html5 export of the game. Have fun! (better use Chrome)
